edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories

Interface UserToMemberMappingDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserToMemberMappingDaoImpl

    public interface UserToMemberMappingDao
    DAO interface for all user to member registration mapping entity accesses
    Author:
    Pramod R Khare, Swapnil Gupta

      • getAllUserToMemberMappings

        java.util.List<UserToMemberMapping> getAllUserToMemberMappings()
        Get all user to member registrations for all available members;
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • doesUserHaveRoleForMember

        boolean doesUserHaveRoleForMember(java.lang.Long userId,
                                RoleType role,
                                java.lang.Long memberId)
        Checks if given user has a registration for a given member in given specific role
        Parameters:
        userId - - user id
        role - - role
        memberId - - member id
        Returns:
        - boolean result if user has registered with given member with given role

      • getUsersRoleForMember

        RoleType getUsersRoleForMember(java.lang.Long userId,
                             java.lang.Long memberId)
        Get user's role for given member registration, if user is not registered with given member it will return null; If user has multiple roles registered with given member then returns its first role
        Parameters:
        userId - - user id
        memberId - - member id
        Returns:
        - RoleType if given user is registered with given member else returns null

      • getAllRegisterableMembersForUser

        java.util.List<UserToMemberMapping> getAllRegisterableMembersForUser(java.lang.Long userId)
        Get all registerable members for which given user has registered with
        Parameters:
        userId - - id of user
        Returns:
        - list of mappings for which given user has registered with some kind of role

      • getAllUserRolesForMember

        java.util.List<UserToMemberMapping> getAllUserRolesForMember(java.lang.Long userId,
                                                           java.lang.Long memberId)
        Get all roles a given user has assumed for a given member
        Parameters:
        userId - - id of user
        memberId - - id of member
        Returns:
        - list of role mappings that given user have for given member
